Clothing is in

Our first run of Champion clothing has arrived. We will have a distribution night at Landry's in Norwood on Monday March 18th from 6-8pm. There will be plenty of refreshments to enjoy. Even if you didn't order clothing this round come down and meet some of the new members.

There is another order for clothing that is currently open to all members and will close on March 31st. If you need the login or help with the order reach out to Ari or Pete.
